song.title: Thor's Magic Bathtub
song.info:
This is the soundtrack to sin(x) by Dawn3 (now TDA).
---
distance/lackluster distance@mindless.com
24.11.97 18.12 + 02.02.98
[#tpolm] you can sit in it it tends to eat people dune survived it but grew horns in the process xmas hitpresent in sweden [/#tpolm]
---
Code by Brainpower (Paulo Cadavez). Graphics by Ruptuh. Music by Distance. 3rd Place at The Gathering'98 intro-competition
"Released in April 1998 at The Gathering '98 demoparty. Finished 3rd in the 64KB intro compo. Code: Brainpower Music: Distance (NOT DJ DISTANCE, NOT DISTANCE ON PLANET-MU, instead Distance/Lackluster - aka esa ruoho) Graphics: Data Disrupter Platform: Pentium 166MHz, 32MB RAM, VGA, GUS/SB, MS-DOS "
